Today in Sutherland, Balnakeil and Oldshoremore are both clean with 3 ft @ 8s WNW swell and fresh 22 mph NNE winds. Best conditions are during the mid-tide push from 09:10 to 15:32. Tomorrow, expect a solid 4 ft @ 10s NNW swell with light 1 mph N winds, making for fun surf at spots like Melvich and Strathy. The day after, conditions will be OK with 3 ft @ 10s NNW swell and moderate 12 mph NNW winds. Best: tomorrow.
